jd: From: peter, Eminence Technology Solutions LLC peter@eminencets.com Reply to: peter@eminencets.com Position: Data Engineer Location: Mclean, VA Type: Contract Contract: 24 months Need 10 plus And Local in Person Interview First round Glider test Data Engineer 10+ years of experience in building end-to-end business solutions using Informatica Power Center Demonstrated strength in data modeling, ETL development, and data warehousing. Expertise in Informatica all mapping transformations like Lookup, Normalizer, Update Strategy, Expression, Filter TX, etc. Strong experience on star schema data modeling and data warehouse concepts. Expertise in Oracle database and advanced SQL Expertise in Agile delivery methodology including Sprint and Kanban Expertise in Python and Spark SQL Knowledge of Cloud technologies Azure and/or GCP Knowledge of Kafka Knowledge of REST APIs Thanks, and regards, Peter Recruitment manager Eminence Technology Solutions LLC Email: Peter@eminencets.com Website: www.eminencets.com
